questions.text: A large enterprise with multiple AWS accounts needs to implement centralized billing and governance. They require the ability to apply Service Control Policies (SCPs) to restrict actions across all accounts. Which AWS service should they use?

choices.text: AWS Control Tower with AWS Organizations
AWS Systems Manager with AWS Config

questions.explanation: AWS Control Tower with AWS Organizations provides centralized billing, account management, and the ability to apply Service Control Policies (SCPs) across all accounts in the organization.

questions.text: An application requires a database that can handle millions of requests per second with single-digit millisecond latency. The data model is key-value based. Which database service is most appropriate?
questions.explanation: Amazon DynamoDB is designed for key-value workloads requiring single-digit millisecond latency at any scale. On-demand capacity mode automatically scales to handle millions of requests per second.
